content.name: Icons8
content.description: Icons8 is an online platform that offers an extensive collection of high-quality icons and design assets for designers, developers, and creatives. It provides a diverse selection of icons in various styles, sizes, and formats, making it a valuable resource for web and app designers, as well as anyone in need of graphical elements for their projects-.

content.name: Font Awesome
content.description: FontAwesome is a popular and widely used icon set and toolkit for web developers and designers. It provides a comprehensive collection of scalable vector icons that can be easily customized and integrated into web projects, making it a valuable resource for creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications.
